venue.name: David Rockefeller Center for Latin Studies

item.description:
Invitation from BLIFF: http://myemail.consta...

Join us to celebrate BLIFF 9th Anniversary!
The ceremony is for free and will run from 5:30 until 7:00 pm. followed by the opening documentary:
El Ambulante "A man arrives at a village driving his rickety car. He proposes the village authorities to make a feature film there. Only the village people including the authorities would act in the film. The traveller only asks for lodging and meals till his filmÂ´s release a month afterwards..."
Website and trailer: http://elambulantedoc...

This year BLIFF will show 40 movies from about 15 different countries in 4 interesting days full of culture, receptions, special guests and Spanishfrom December 2-5. Films will be screened at several venues including the David Rockefeller Center for Latin American Studies at Harvard University in Cambridge, the Paramount Center at Emerson College in Downtown Crossing, and the Zumix Firehouse Auditorium in East Boston.

For film info, tickets, etc, please visit http://bliff.org/inde....

Films are subtitle in English.

group.name: The Boston Spanish Language Meetup Group
